name: World Spinner
description:
This game is based in the XKCD comic found here.

## Ranked 89 in the XKCD Game Jam!!! ##

(Which I find cool, since I was using a toolset I was unfamiliar with!)

It is a really simple game, you use the Earth as your fidget spinner... with your body, using the spacebar. It is a very simple concept, but it goes along with the theme and you can get some interesting comments the further you go. So get the Earth a spinning and watch the reactions.

This game is written with LibGDX in jython, I just had to try it.
